name: Attacked from Above
description:
Attacked from Above

Attacked from Above - an atmospheric  isometric game with aliens 👾👽

Your a robot 🤖 trying to get to the telepad while dodging lasers and pushing buttons... can you find the secret ending?!

Robots, aliens, lasers, two endings, and fun. Play it now on the itch.io page (fullscreen recommended)

Controls

Move using WASD or Arrow keys  and hit p to pause the game

Resources 📚

Fog effect from lmhpoly.com

Sound Effects: sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Game for Innovator's Jam 2021

Game by Andrew Li

Source Code: GitHub
